name: bird out of CTRL
description:
Some fish are in trouble in paradise... one seagull can save the day!

Can you overcome the challenge of a seagull who forgets how to fly and save your fishy friends?

Controls:

CTRL

WASD - Move

CTRL - Down

Space - Up

Every 30 seconds the control scheme changes - same keys, different bindings.

Escape - Quit Game

Created in two days for the GMTK Game Jam 2020.

My first dive into the world of 3D.
